data.text: @MattPStout This “policy” should have never been made. No amount of cases will ever make segregation lawful. (Never mind the fact cases were already low when they made the policy 🙄).. Apologies are needed @RonMariano & @KarenSpilka. No more Zoom meetings‼️ Follow accommodation law. #mapoli https://t.co/R55gr11j9n

@KevinEConnor @MattPStout Legally, all of these “policies” can’t be required. They aren’t laws. Masks can’t be “required” or forced onto anyone. Public accommodation law must be followed. The fact it hasn’t been is unlawful. https://t.co/JQ2Lc1jGn0
@KevinEConnor From what I can tell, the rule that people can’t enter the building after 5 pm (even when legislators are in session) still stands, no?
@MattPStout I’d suggest they’ve lifted all restrictions. Technically masks have always been optional in the state house
